headline: Trump touts J.D. Vance at Ohio rally
author: Grayson Quay
sentences: According to Rolling Stone, Trump hit on a variety of other topics during his 90-minute speech, including his own good looks, the importance of water pressure, his performance on a mental aptitude test, and the allegedly "rigged and stolen" 2020 presidential election.
